_pid.title: Persistent Identifiers
_pid.description: Array of persistent identifiers pointing to this record

community.title: Community
community.description: Identifier of the community to which the record has been submitted

title.title: Title
title.description: The title of the uploaded resource - a name that indicates the content to be expected.

description.title: Description
description.description: A more elaborate description of the resource. Focus on a description of content making it easy for others to find it and to interpret its relevance quickly.

open_access.title: Open Access
open_access.description: Indicate whether the resource is open or access is restricted. In case of restricted access the uploaded files will not be public, however the metadata will be.

embargo_date.title: Embargo Date
embargo_date.description: Date that the embargo will expire.

licence.title: Licence
licence.description: Specify the license under which this data set is available to the users (e.g. GPL, Apache v2 or Commercial). Please use the License Selector for help and additional information.

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: A list of keywords that characterize the content.

contact_email.title: Contact Email
contact_email.description: Contact email information for this record

discipline.title: Discipline
discipline.description: The scientific discipline linked with the resource.

contributors.title: Contributors
contributors.description: The list of all other contributors. Mention all persons that were relevant in the creation of the resource.

alternate_identifier.title: Alternate identifier
alternate_identifier.description: Any kind of other reference such as a URN, URI or an ISBN number.

version.title: Version
version.description: Denote the version of the resource.

publisher.title: Publisher
publisher.description: The entity responsible for making the resource available, either a person, an organization, or a service.

language.title: Language
language.description: The name of the language the document is written in.
